location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Captain Thomas Smee, Commander of the Benaresand Senior Officer in the Gulf of Persia

mods.abstract: Letter concerns a packet received from Sir Gore Ouseley. Bruce requests that the packet be transmitted to Sir Evan Nepean, Bombay, on one of the vessels under Smee's command. Includes a list of packets and private letters forwarded to Bombay on board the Ternate,under the command of Henry Davidson.
